_source.text: 1) - best reliever ever, next to Wilhelm 2) - well he's better than Sutter and Fingers 3) - we need to put a relief pitcher in (we're a little short in that category) and he's clearly the best 4) - he's better than Lee Smith and Smith holds the saves record
